property.name: solr_collection_service_logs
property.description: Name for the service logs collection

property.name: solr_collection_audit_logs
property.description: Name for the audit logs collection

property.name: solr_audit_logs_use_ranger
property.description: Use Ranger Audit collection. This is supported only if Ranger Solr is installed in SolrCloud mode

property.name: solr_audit_logs_zk_quorum
property.description: Only needed if using custom solr cloud. E.g. zk1:2181,zk2:2182

property.name: solr_audit_logs_zk_node
property.description: Only needed if using custom solr cloud. E.g. /audit_logs

property.name: logsearch_collection_numshards
property.description: Number of shards for Solr collections

property.name: logsearch_service_logs_max_retention
property.description: Days to retain the service logs in Solr

property.name: logsearch_audit_logs_max_retention
property.description: Days to retain the audit logs in Solr
